entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 near midnight then west 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
